alert.note: Alert for Haskell; Le Flore; Sequoyah (Oklahoma) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued October 15 at 7:00PM CDT by NWS Tulsa
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of east central Haskell, southeastern Sequoyah and northeastern Le Flore Counties through 730 PM CDT... At 700 PM CDT, Doppler radar indicated a strong thunderstorm over Gans, moving east at 20 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and nickel size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down small tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations in or near the path include... Sallisaw... Pocola... Muldrow... Roland... Spiro... Arkoma... Panama... Bokoshe... Gans... Moffett... Rock Island... Cowlington... Scullyville... Braden... Cottonwood... Dora... This includes Interstate 40 in Oklahoma between mile markers 303 and 328. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.88 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. A Severe Thunderstorm Watch remains in effect until 1100 PM CDT for northwestern and west central Arkansas...and southeastern and east central Oklahoma.
